stash_cache.c

00001 #include <net-snmp/net-snmp-config.h>
00002 
00003 #if HAVE_STRING_H
00004 #include <string.h>
00005 #else
00006 #include <strings.h>
00007 #endif

00009 #include <net-snmp/net-snmp-includes.h>
00010 #include <net-snmp/agent/net-snmp-agent-includes.h>

00012 #include <net-snmp/agent/stash_cache.h>
00013 
00014 #if HAVE_DMALLOC_H
00015 #include <dmalloc.h>
00016 #endif

00028 netsnmp_stash_cache_info *
00029 netsnmp_get_new_stash_cache(void)
00030 {
00031     netsnmp_stash_cache_info *cinfo;
00032 
00033     cinfo = SNMP_MALLOC_TYPEDEF(netsnmp_stash_cache_info);
00034     cinfo->cache_length = 30;
00035     return cinfo;
00036 }
00037 
00041 netsnmp_mib_handler *
00042 netsnmp_get_stash_cache_handler(void)
00043 {
00044     netsnmp_mib_handler *handler;
00045     netsnmp_stash_cache_info *cinfo;
00046 
00047     cinfo = netsnmp_get_new_stash_cache();
00048     if (!cinfo)
00049         return NULL;
00050 
00051     handler = netsnmp_create_handler("stash_cache", netsnmp_stash_cache_helper);
00052     if (!handler) {
00053         free(cinfo);
00054         return NULL;
00055     }
00056 
00057     handler->myvoid = cinfo;
00058 
00059     return handler;
00060 }
00061 
00063 netsnmp_oid_stash_node  **
00064 netsnmp_extract_stash_cache(netsnmp_agent_request_info *reqinfo)
00065 {
00066     return netsnmp_agent_get_list_data(reqinfo, STASH_CACHE_NAME);
00067 }
00068 
00069 
00071 int
00072 netsnmp_stash_cache_helper(netsnmp_mib_handler *handler,
00073                            netsnmp_handler_registration *reginfo,
00074                            netsnmp_agent_request_info *reqinfo,
00075                            netsnmp_request_info *requests)
00076 {
00077     netsnmp_stash_cache_info *cinfo;
00078     netsnmp_oid_stash_node *cnode;
00079     netsnmp_variable_list *cdata;
00080     netsnmp_request_info *request;
00081     int ret;
00082 
00083     DEBUGMSGTL(("helper:stash_cache", "Got request\n"));
00084 
00085     cinfo = (netsnmp_stash_cache_info *) handler->myvoid;
00086     if (!cinfo) {
00087         cinfo = netsnmp_get_new_stash_cache();
00088         handler->myvoid = cinfo;
00089     }
00090 
00091     switch (reqinfo->mode) {
00092 
00093     case MODE_GET:
00094         if ((ret = netsnmp_stash_cache_update(handler, reginfo,
00095                                               reqinfo, requests, cinfo)))
00096             return ret;
00097         for(request = requests; request; request = request->next) {
00098             cdata =
00099                 netsnmp_oid_stash_get_data(cinfo->cache,
00100                                            requests->requestvb->name,
00101                                            requests->requestvb->name_length);
00102             if (cdata && cdata->val.string && cdata->val_len) {
00103                 snmp_set_var_typed_value(request->requestvb, cdata->type,
00104                                          cdata->val.string, cdata->val_len);
00105             }
00106         }
00107         return SNMP_ERR_NOERROR;
00108         break;
00109 
00110     case MODE_GETNEXT:
00111         if ((ret = netsnmp_stash_cache_update(handler, reginfo,
00112                                               reqinfo, requests, cinfo)))
00113             return ret;
00114         for(request = requests; request; request = request->next) {
00115             cnode =
00116                 netsnmp_oid_stash_getnext_node(cinfo->cache,
00117                                                requests->requestvb->name,
00118                                                requests->requestvb->name_length);
00119             if (cnode && cnode->thedata) {
00120                 cdata = cnode->thedata;
00121                 if (cdata->val.string && cdata->name && cdata->name_length) {
00122                     snmp_set_var_typed_value(request->requestvb, cdata->type,
00123                                              cdata->val.string, cdata->val_len);
00124                     snmp_set_var_objid(request->requestvb, cdata->name,
00125                                        cdata->name_length);
00126                 }
00127             }
00128         }
00129         return SNMP_ERR_NOERROR;
00130         break;
00131 
00132     default:
00133         cinfo->cache_valid = 0;
00134         return netsnmp_call_next_handler(handler, reginfo, reqinfo,
00135                                          requests);
00136     }
00137     return SNMP_ERR_GENERR;     /* should never get here */
00138 }
00139 
00142 int
00143 netsnmp_stash_cache_update(netsnmp_mib_handler *handler,
00144                            netsnmp_handler_registration *reginfo,
00145                            netsnmp_agent_request_info *reqinfo,
00146                            netsnmp_request_info *requests,
00147                            netsnmp_stash_cache_info *cinfo)
00148 {
00149     int old_mode;
00150     int ret;
00151     if (!cinfo->cache_time ||
00152         atime_ready(cinfo->cache_time, 1000*cinfo->cache_length)) {
00153         DEBUGMSGTL(("stash_cache",
00154                     "(re)filling cache (done every %d seconds)\n",
00155                     cinfo->cache_length));
00156         /* free the old */
00157         netsnmp_oid_stash_free(&cinfo->cache,
00158                                (NetSNMPStashFreeNode *) snmp_free_var);
00159 
00160         /* change modes to the GET_STASH mode */
00161         old_mode = reqinfo->mode;
00162         reqinfo->mode = MODE_GET_STASH;
00163         netsnmp_agent_add_list_data(reqinfo,
00164                                     netsnmp_create_data_list(STASH_CACHE_NAME,
00165                                                              &cinfo->cache,
00166                                                              NULL));
00167 
00168         /* have the next handler fill stuff in and switch modes back */
00169         ret = netsnmp_call_next_handler(handler, reginfo, reqinfo, requests);
00170         reqinfo->mode = old_mode;
00171 
00172         /* update the cache time */
00173         if (cinfo->cache_time) {
00174             atime_setMarker(cinfo->cache_time);
00175         } else {
00176             cinfo->cache_time = atime_newMarker();
00177         }
00178         return ret;
00179     }
00180     return SNMP_ERR_NOERROR;
00181 }
00182 
00187 void
00188 netsnmp_init_stash_cache_helper(void)
00189 {
00190     netsnmp_register_handler_by_name("stash_cache",
00191                                      netsnmp_get_stash_cache_handler());
00192 }
